document.full_text: a virginia district court jury has ordered allergan inc to pay $212 million to a man who claimed that injections of wrinkle-smoothing botox left him with brain damage.
document.title: jury orders allergan to pay $212 million in botox case
lines_and_colors: a virginia district court jury has ordered allergan inc to pay $212 million to a man who claimed that injections of wrinkle-smoothing botox left him with brain damage.
